title: log in
body: ive been trying to log in to my other account my main one and i cannot get in at all wtf is going i need help!!!!!

replies.body:
(If the issue isn't already resolved) you need to give specific details. Are you trying to log into the boards or the client? If its a boards thing, make sure that you're trying to sign in to oce (sometimes it randomly switches to na).

If its a client thing, are you entering your password wrong? Unspecified error occurring? Attempting to reconnect attempt x failed?
im trying to log into the client but its saying the password is wrong but ive had it for 4 years!

If this still hasn't been resolved, try r[ecovering your password](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751734-Recovering-Your-Password) (You will need to have access to the email used to create account).

If this doesn't work/you don't have access to the email, send in a [support ticket to recover your account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694). Keep in mind, account recovery is a lengthy process and may take a while for support to verify that you are the actual owner. During such a time, please refrain from sending more support tickets as it pushes you to the bottom of the queue. 
Also DO NOT POST ANY OF THE RECOVERY INFORMATION ON THE BOARDS (it compromises the security and messes up the verification process and you may completely lose your account).
